property.name: Rules
property.value: As The Mimeoplasm enters the battlefield, you may exile two creature cards from graveyards. If you do, it enters the battlefield as a copy of one of those cards with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the power of the other card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Skip your draw step. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have fewer than seven cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ask your query and be on your way. Just don't look her in the eye.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Vorosh, the Hunter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, put six +1/+1 counters on Vorosh.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards. −2: Sacrifice an artifact. If you do, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield. −1[0]: You get an emblem with "Whenever an artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step." Daretti, Scrap Savant can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample {3}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Bosh, Iron Golem deals damage equal to the sacrificed artifact's mana value to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Glissa searches for the truth about Memnarch, Bosh searches to unearth the secrets of his past.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{R}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature card in your graveyard, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike, vigilance Whenever you cast a creature spell with mana value 5 or greater, you get an experience counter. Kalemne, Disciple of Iroas gets +1/+1 for each experience counter you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Anya, Merciless Angel gets +3/+3 for each opponent whose life total is less than half their starting life total. As long as an opponent's life total is less than half their starting life total, Anya has indestructible.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike If a source would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead. If a source would deal damage to you or a permanent you control, prevent half that damage, rounded up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance, deathtouch, lifelink At the beginning of your end step, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Ishai, Ojutai Dragonspeaker. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Through me, the Great Teacher's voice will rattle this world."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reyhan, Last of the Abzan enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever a creature you control dies or is put into the command zone, if it had one or more +1/+1 counters on it, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on target creature. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fastest way across the dunes is above.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Angel of Serenity enters the battlefield, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards. When Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Arbiter of Knollridge enters the battlefield, each player's life total becomes the highest life total among all players.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though giants are mortal, they live so long and on such a grand scale that many small folk don't believe they ever truly die.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have vigilance. Each creature you control can block an additional creature each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enduring the most desolate and dangerous conditions, Abzan sentries unfailingly guard the stronghold gates.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Avacyn's holy warriors kept hope alive in her darkest hours. Now they will carry that hope across Innistrad.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Citadel Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. • Khans - At the beginning of combat on your turn, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. • Dragons - At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, tap target creature that player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Exile target creature. Its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Custodi Soulbinders enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures on the battlefield. {2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Custodi Soulbinders: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your end step, choose a creature card in an opponent's graveyard, then that player chooses a creature card in your graveyard. You may return those cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {8}: Tap all creatures target player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What we knew as Emeria, Ula, and Cosi were not divine beings at all, but a cruel trick, and a grave error." - The Invokers' Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more creatures attack, you may have target attacking creature gain double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best techniques outlive their creators.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Elite Scaleguard enters the battlefield, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.) Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant permanent When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Jareth, Leonine Titan blocks, it gets +7/+7 until end of turn. {W}: Jareth gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Light's champion in the stronghold of darkness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance {5}{W}{W}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Kalemne's Captain becomes monstrous, exile all artifacts and enchantments.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Oreskos Explorer enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X Plains cards, where X is the number of players who control more lands than you. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If this spell was kicked, it deals damage equal to that permanent's mana value to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. If a player does, creatures that player controls can't attack you or planeswalkers you control until your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov care not for repentance, only repayment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Reveillark leaves the battlefield, return up to two target creature cards with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Evoke {5}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.) Destroy all creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Exhale, and let the winds carry your soul for all eternity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A blazing sun that never sets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Victory's Herald attacks, attacking creatures gain flying and lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The corruption stirred the heavens above, awaking a shining champion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Deepglow Skate enters the battlefield, double the number of each kind of counter on any number of target permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its graceful glide paints the ocean floor with strokes of luminescence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell with mana value 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You are beneath contempt. Your lineage will be forgotten."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards in their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her voice is insight, piercing and true." - Ixidor, reality sculptor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Try to pretend like you understand what's important."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target Equipment, then create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token and attach that Equipment to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even your blade knows who will triumph here." - Atraxa, Praetors' Voice

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top ten cards of your library. Starting with the next opponent in turn order, each opponent chooses a different nonland card from among them. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player mills two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Filigree Texts do not compel you to act in accordance with their precepts. They only specify the consequences should you fail." - Lodus of the Ethersworn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Join forces - Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana. Each player draws X cards, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards. Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, that creature's controller mills two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fools surrender their sanity to his riddles. Even greater fools try to solve them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Slipstream Eel can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a fine way to travel, if you don't mind the smell."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard. Put Spell Crumple on the bottom of its owner's library.

property.value: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Countless delights drift on the surface while dark schemes run below.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Soaring is wasted on the winged." - Edric, Spymaster of Trest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To fill your mind with knowledge, we must start by emptying it." - Barrin, master wizard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The awestruck birds gazed at Wonder. Slowly, timidly, they rose into the air." - Scroll of Beginnings

property.value: If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, this spell costs {6} less to cast. Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) {T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.value: Morph {X}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Bane of the Living is turned face up, all creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to three creature cards, put them into your graveyard, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scrape of shovels and the tumble of cold dirt soon muffled their pleas.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Dark Hatchling enters the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever another creature leaves the battlefield, you may have target player mill two cards. Unearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Festercreep enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. {1}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Festercreep: All other creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single festercreep isn't alone. It's already an infestation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bonds of loyalty can tie one to the grave." - Crovax, ascendant evincar

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only a thin layer of dirt separates civilization from an undead apocalypse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life is such a fragile thing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player exiles all creature cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mortivore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards. {B}: Regenerate Mortivore.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The light sigh of its breath whistles through its bones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Necroplasm. At the beginning of your end step, destroy each creature with mana value equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on Necroplasm. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, you may mill two cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rat offering (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant by sacrificing a Rat and paying the difference in mana costs between this and the sacrificed Rat. Mana cost includes color.) Whenever a permanent is put into an opponent's graveyard, that player loses 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death is no excuse for disobedience." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Scythe Specter deals combat damage to a player, each opponent discards a card. Each player who discarded a card with the highest mana value among cards discarded this way loses life equal to that mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Sewer Nemesis enters the battlefield, choose a player. Sewer Nemesis's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in the chosen player's graveyard. Whenever the chosen player casts a spell, that player mills a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Join forces - Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana. Each player mills X cards, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Little agonies pave the way to greater power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Threshold - Return that card from your graveyard to the battlefield instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other player sacrifices a creature. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each creature sacrificed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Necromancers deal in commodities far more precious than gold and grain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If fear is the only tool you have left, then you'll never control me." - Xantcha, to Gix

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has intimidate, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control. (A creature with intimidate can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I grant you blades - on the condition that they are not pointed at me." - Damia, Sage of Stone

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Beetleback Chief enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether trained, ridden, or eaten, few goblin military innovations have rivaled the bug.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Bitter Feud enters the battlefield, choose two players. If a source controlled by one of the chosen players would deal damage to the other chosen player or a permanent that player controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield. Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Holy places are no longer sanctuary from death, and death is no longer sanctuary from anything." - Thalia, Knight-Cathar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying When Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Borderland Behemoth gets +4/+4 for each other Giant you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Giants share nothing but their fury.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Creatures enchanted player controls attack each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the moon rises and the bloodlust takes hold, nothing matters but the kill.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.) When Desolation Giant enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures you control. If it was kicked, destroy all other creatures instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand. Disaster Radius deals X damage to each creature your opponents control, where X is the revealed card's mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Dream Pillager deals combat damage to a player, exile that many cards from the top of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wings shimmer with dreams absorbed from its enemies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It has been my experience that disasters like to strike in pairs."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They fell screaming into the depths of the chasm like so many pebbles tossed down a well.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn has abandoned us! We have nothing left except what we can take!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to another target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is unwise to insult the god of the forge. It is also unwise to stand near anyone else who has insulted him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Fiery Confluence deals 1 damage to each creature. • Fiery Confluence deals 2 damage to each opponent. • Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim." - Sisay, captain of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fumiko the Lowblood has bushido X, where X is the number of attacking creatures. (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +X/+X until end of turn.) Creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Choose target artifact a player controls and target artifact card in that player's graveyard. If both targets are still legal as this ability resolves, that player simultaneously sacrifices the artifact and returns the artifact card to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wrecked your metal guy, boss. But look! I made you an ashtray."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Hamletback Goliath, where X is that creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you live on a giant's back, there's only one individual you'll ever need to fear." - Gaddock Teeg

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Hammerfist Giant deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oh sure, they buy a lot of ale, but I always find myself needing to rebuild after the giants have paid a visit." - Belko, owner of Titan's Keg tavern

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {3}{R}: Destroy target artifact. Hoard-Smelter Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that artifact's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He collects the precious metals, and then converts the rest to propellant.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste If a spell you control would deal damage to an opponent, prevent that damage. Create a 3/1 red Elemental Shaman creature token with haste for each 1 damage prevented this way. When Hostility is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste When Hunted Dragon enters the battlefield, target opponent creates three 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The knights see a mighty quarry. The dragon sees breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Impact Resonance deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the greatest amount of damage dealt by a source to a permanent or player this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each player, Incite Rebellion deals damage to that player and each creature that player controls equal to the number of creatures they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing breaks the monotony like a good old-fashioned riot.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elementals are ideas given form. This one is the idea of "smashitude."

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its open mouth is a furnace blast that blisters the skin. Its smoking fists are meteors that split the earth.

property.value: "Where will you run when I punish you with the very ground you flee on?" - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fate is not as fixed as you might think."

property.value: Meteor Blast deals 4 damage to each of X targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Behold astronomy's contribution to war." - Fennor Rhyl, starcaller

property.value: Creatures named Lightning Rager can't attack you or planeswalkers you control. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player creates a 5/1 red Elemental creature token named Lightning Rager. It has trample, haste, and "At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this creature."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player exiles all artifact cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all artifacts they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where a lesser mind sees junk, I see infinite potential."

property.value: When Spitebellows leaves the battlefield, it deals 6 damage to target creature. Evoke {1}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.value: Disaster stalks with gaping jaws across unready lands.

property.value: Starstorm deals X damage to each creature. Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ever since the disaster, the city's survivors viewed the star-strewn sky with dread.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Giant spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Boggarts constantly strive to outdo each other with the things they bring back to the warren, each hoping the exploit will become as well-known as those of Auntie Grub.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {6}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Stoneshock Giant becomes monstrous, creatures without flying your opponents control can't block this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Giant creatures you control get +2/+2 and have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A hundred generations has he mentored, a hundred armies has he crushed beneath his feet, yet only a hundred words has he ever spoken, each more revered than a hundred books.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Taurean Mauler.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The power of a waterfall. The fury of an avalanche. The intellect of a gale-force wind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Thundercloud Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to the number of Giants you control to each non-Giant creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He cares not for the disasters his storm brings as long as his path ahead is clear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Tuktuk the Explorer dies, create Tuktuk the Returned, a legendary 5/5 colorless Goblin Golem artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Remade by Eldrazi magic, Tuktuk inspired an entire clan of misguided goblins.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste Lieutenant - As long as you control your commander, Tyrant's Familiar gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever Tyrant's Familiar attacks, it deals 7 damage to target creature defending player controls."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing escapes its gaze - or its breath.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonbasic land you don't control and target nonbasic land of an opponent's choice you don't control. Volcanic Offering deals 7 damage to target creature you don't control and 7 damage to target creature of an opponent's choice you don't control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying All creatures attack each combat if able. {1}{R}: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wings beat to the howls of war and fan the fires of rage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Listen to the roar! Feel the thunder! The Immersturm shouts its approval with every bolt of lightning!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whipflare deals 2 damage to each nonartifact creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The slag-workers wasted no time in creating their own flare pulses to cleanse the area of the incompleat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) Untap target permanent and gain control of it until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample As long as Brawn is in your graveyard and you control a Forest, creatures you control have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘I have arrived,' bellowed Brawn, and the plane shuddered." - Scroll of Beginnings

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with power less than Champion of Lambholt's power can't block creatures you control. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of Lambholt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Naga shed their scales. We wear ours with pride." - Golran, dragonscale captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Kalonian Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Kalonian Hydra attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even baloths fear its feeding time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ach! Hans, run! It's the lhurgoyf!" - Saffi Eriksdotter, last words

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment and up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are many ruins, but there used to be many more.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Strive - This spell costs {1}{G} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Choose any number of target creatures. Double the number of +1/+1 counters on each of them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent sacrifices an artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You may enter, but leave those lifeless things of your world behind." - Modruni, maro-sorcerer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) {1}{G}: Regenerate Troll Ascetic.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's no coincidence that the oldest trolls are also the angriest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Outlast {G} ({G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One quiet word sets off the stampede.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3, has trample, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Savagery is the birthright of every creature that draws breath - or wishes it could." - Karador, Ghost Chieftain

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle. {2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your hand, then discard a card for each card drawn this way. Basic landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some see the world as a place of infinite wonder and knowledge. Some see it as an infinite dinner plate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, twice that many +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Weakness is not in the nature of the Swarm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Desecrator Hag enters the battlefield, return to your hand the creature card in your graveyard with the greatest power. If two or more cards are tied for greatest power, you choose one of them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Loose earth is not a burial but an appetizer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose up to one creature. Destroy the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Abzan turn to this spell only as a last resort, for its inevitable result is what they most dread: to be alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on another creature you control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Enduring Scalelord.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the sun that beats down upon Arashin's walls could shine more brightly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on Fathom Mage, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ghave, Guru of Spores enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on Juniper Order Ranger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To protect the alliance between Kjeldor and Yavimaya, they trained in the ways of both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other creature you control enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to Master Biomancer's power and as a Mutant in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature is a wonderful engineer but works far too slowly for my tastes."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Exile all artifacts. • Exile all creatures. • Exile all enchantments. • Exile all planeswalkers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create four 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying. Basic landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other creature becomes a copy of target nonlegendary creature until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who are different are untrustworthy, unpredictable. Put your safety in the hands of your own kind." - Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many who cross Sorin's path come down with a sudden and fatal case of being-in-the-way-of-a-millennia-old-vampire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are all decaying, always in a state of near-death. One moment without breath and we begin to break down." - Cevraya, Golgari shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever Skullbriar, the Walking Grave deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Counters remain on Skullbriar as it moves to any zone other than a player's hand or library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a token that's a copy of target creature. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spitting is the customary greeting between a creature and its magical impostor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile up to two target artifacts and/or enchantments. Basic landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.value: Flying If Szadek, Lord of Secrets would deal combat damage to a player, instead put that many +1/+1 counters on Szadek and that player mills that many cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}{U}, {T}: Double the number of each kind of counter on target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I used to hurl rocks and eat scraps of meat burned over a fire. Look at what I've become and tell me Simic does not hold infinite possibility."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on Vulturous Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When something dies, all things benefit. Well okay, just our things." - Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk, swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island or a Swamp.) Whenever Wrexial, the Risen Deep deals combat damage to a player, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Astral Cornucopia enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. {T}: Choose a color. Add one mana of that color for each charge counter on Astral Cornucopia.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In case of fire, treachery, citywide riot, political upheaval, or worldwide societal collapse, break glass." - Cluestone inscription

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size - a weight of strength and of pride." - Agrus Kos

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Caged Sun enters the battlefield, choose a color. Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+1. Whenever a land's ability causes you to add one or more mana of the chosen color, add one additional mana of that color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Instead of creating a tool that would be damaged by heat, the Thran built one that was charged by it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Choose any number of target creatures. Each of those creatures gains persist until end of turn. (When it dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield tapped. As Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Phyrexian death machine awoke, its coldsteel heart imbuing it with sinister new power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It harmonizes with the essence of its master.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Converge - Crystalline Crawler enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Crystalline Crawler: Add one mana of any color. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Crystalline Crawler.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this artifact.) {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It reflects the purity of Mirrodin-that-was." - Koth of the Hammer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members - and the doomed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Dreamstone Hedron: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the Eldrazi mind thinks in the warped paths required to open the hedrons and tap the power within.

property.value: Epochrasite enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it if you didn't cast it from your hand. When Epochrasite dies, exile it with three time counters on it and it gains suspend. (At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, they remove a time counter. When the last is removed, they may cast this card without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

property.value: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They'll soon become accustomed to wearing skin that is not their own." - Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The oil created the mycosynth. The mycosynth created New Phyrexia.

property.value: For the Phyrexians, death is not an end, nor a one-time occurrence.

property.value: The form of the sigil is just as important as the sigil itself. If it's carried on a medallion, its bearer is a master. If it's tattooed on the body, its bearer is a slave.

property.value: The myr are like the Glimmervoid: blank canvases on which to build grand creations.

property.value: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.

If you spend this mana to cast your commander, it enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of times it's been cast from the command zone this game.
